short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A connectivity checker that informs you when internet goes out by showing a little message on each tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that keeps a track of whether the internet is connected and lets you know when it goes down. Also detects captive portals
